correctness.description: The accuracy of the solution provided in terms of mathematical steps and logic.

comprehensibility.description: How clear and easy to understand the explanations and step-by-step guide provided for solving the problem.

conciseness.description: The degree to which the solution is presented in a brief and clear manner without unnecessary steps.

completeness.description: How well the solution covers all necessary steps and considerations required for solving the problem.

efficiency.description: The effectiveness and speed of the algorithm or method used to solve the problem.

response_time.description: The time taken to provide the complete solution to the problem.
